Configure cache time, method and related: Configure cache time, method and related 3rd party integrations.
Which method should be used for storing: Which method should be used for storing and retrieving cached items.
\"File\" is the best option for most cas: "File" is the best option for most cases and should not be changed, unless you are familiar with another cache method and have it set up on the server already.
Enable envato integration (social login,: Enable envato integration (social login, purchase code validation, sales reports and more)
Require users to enter a valid purchase:
Require users to enter a valid purchase code in order to register and submit support requests.
            Envato social login will also check for purchase code automatically when this is enabled.
Users will only be able to find articles: Users will only be able to find articles for items that they have purchased.
This will automatically import all your: This will automatically import all your envato items for use as categories in new ticket and tickets list pages.
Change help center settings, import\/exp: Change help center settings, import/export help center data.

How many child categories should each pa: How many child categories should each parent category display in help center homepage.
How many items (maximum) should be displ: How many items (maximum) should be displayed in help center search page.
In what way should help center articles: In what way should help center articles be ordered by default.

Change incoming and outgoing email handl: Change incoming and outgoing email handlers, email credentials and more.
All outgoing application emails will be: All outgoing application emails will be sent from this email address.
All outgoing application emails will be sent using this name.
Your selected mail method must be author: Your selected mail method must be authorized to send emails using this address and name.
API (Send emails to app via http): API (Send emails to app via http)
Which method should be used to handle in: Which method should be used to handle incoming application emails.
Secret key used to secure incoming appli: Secret key used to secure incoming application webhook requests. Any random string will work.
Which method should be used for sending: Which method should be used for sending outgoing application emails.
Usually the domain of your site (site.co: Usually the domain of your site (site.com)
Use default email templates, even if the: Use default email templates, even if they have been modified via "Mail Templates" page.
Store all original incoming emails, even: Store all original incoming emails, even if they were not used to create a new reply or ticket.
Select active queue method and enter rel: Select active queue method and enter related 3rd party API keys.
Queues allow to defer time consuming tas: Queues allow to defer time consuming tasks, such as sending an email, until a later time. Deferring these tasks can speed up web requests to the application.
All methods except sync require addition: All methods except sync require additional setup, which should be performed before changing the queue method. Consult documentation for more information.
Configure real time functionality and re: Configure real time functionality and related 3rd party integrations.
Enable real time communication between b: Enable real time communication between browser and server.
Realtime will allow new tickets, replies: Realtime will allow new tickets, replies and other things that were created after opening the site to be automatically displayed without needing to refresh the browser.
Configure search method used on the site: Configure search method used on the site as well as related 3rd party integrations.
Which method should be used for searchin: Which method should be used for searching the site (help center and mailbox).
Enabling this will queue all operations: Enabling this will queue all operations that sync data with selected search method for better performance.
\"Elasticsearch\" method and queued data: "Elasticsearch" method and queued data syncing requires additional set up on the server. Consult documentation for more information.
Toggle email functionality for tickets,: Toggle email functionality for tickets, change mail handler, secret key and more.
Send agent replies to ticket creator via: Send agent replies to ticket creator via email.
Create new ticket from incoming emails t: Create new ticket from incoming emails that can't be matched to existing tickets.
Create a reply to existing ticket from i: Create a reply to existing ticket from incoming emails, if email is in reply to that ticket.
Having all three of the above options en: Having all three of the above options enabled will essentially turn the site into a shared inbox. All incoming and outgoing emails will be converted into tickets and replies.
Send a notification to user, if their ti: Send a notification to user, if their ticket has not been created, because ticket creation via email is disabled.
Send a notification to user via email in: Send a notification to user via email informing them that their ticket has been received.

Used for creating yearly, weekly etc ver: Used for creating yearly, weekly etc versions of base plan. Child plans will inherit their parent permissions/features.
How much subscribers of this plan should: How much subscribers of this plan should be charged. (Dollars, euros etc.)
For example, Amount=100, Interval=Year a: For example, Amount=100, Interval=Year and Interval Count=1, will charge user 100 dollars every year.
The frequency with which a subscription: The frequency with which a subscription should be billed.
The number of intervals (specified in th: The number of intervals (specified in the interval property above) between each subscription billing. For example, Interval=Month and Interval Count=3 bills every 3 months.
Order of plans. Lower position will appe: Order of plans. Lower position will appear first.

Configure size and type of files that us: Configure size and type of files that users are able to upload. This will affect all uploads across the site.
Both X-Sendfile and X-Accel need to be e: Both X-Sendfile and X-Accel need to be enabled on the server first. When enabled it will reduce server memory and CPU usage when previewing or downloading files, especially for large files.
When enabled larger files will be upload: When enabled larger files will be uploaded in smaller chunks to improve upload reliability and avoid server max upload size limits.
Size for each file chunk. Should be equa: Size for each file chunk. Should be equal to or lower then max upload file size on your server.
